author: .paulharris
content:
hey beacon-apis people, looking at merging https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/286 and https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/317 assuming there's no more changes required... I've approved 317 so just waiting on confirmation that it's good to go, and 286 looks like a well discussed endpoint at this point...

After those 2 will probably look at blob signing (#302), open to suggestions
